text:
The Corruption Perceptions Index is an index that shows how corrupt certain countries are. Denmark has been the least corrupt nation eight times, while Somalia has been the most corrupt nation six times. All the information on this page is from [http://www.transparency.org/ Transparency International].
The Least Corrupt Country by Year.
"* The nation in bold is the nation with the most titles."
The Most Corrupt Country by Year.
"* The nation in bold is the nation with the most titles."
